name: homebox
description: Homebox is a self hosted inventory management app for home and office. It helps track items, locations, warranties and purchase details, with search and tagging features so you can quickly find what you own and where it is stored.
features: Inventory Tracking: Catalog all your possessions with detailed information and photos.
Location Management: Organize items by room, storage location, or custom categories.
Warranty Tracking: Record purchase dates and warranty information to never miss coverage.
Receipt Storage: Attach digital copies of receipts and purchase documentation.
Search and Filter: Quickly find items using powerful search and tagging system.
Value Tracking: Monitor the total value of your possessions for insurance purposes.
Maintenance Logs: Track maintenance history and schedule future service for items.
Multi-User Support: Share inventory management with family members or roommates.
